text: Juan Behrensen (born 27 April 1904, date of death unknown) was an Argentine swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Argentine male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Argentina Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Santa Fe, Argentina
title: Juan Behrensen
